channel.title: Can someone please help me make a right click send player to jail option?
channel.description:
Hi, i'm new and have just started out on my server and i'm a bit of a noob. :) I was wondering if someone could help me make a right click send player to jail option for admins only? The co-ordinates for a jail are: teleportToX = 2615 teleportToY = 3168 but if you could find co-ordinates for a better jail then go ed
Thanks Nick

Yea but if its just a punishment… its quite fun

Thanks
Nick
